sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react";
import axios from 'axios'
import Parser from 'html-react-parser';
import {Checkbox} from 'pretty-checkbox';
import PhoneInput from 'react-phone-input-2'
import 'react-phone-input-2/lib/style.css'


const validEmailRegex = RegExp(/^(([^<>()\[\]\.,;:\s@\"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\.,;:\s@\"]+)*)|(\".+\"))@(([^<>()[\]\.,;:\s@\"]+\.)+[^<>()[\]\.,;:\s@\"]{2,})$/i);
const validateForm = (errors) => {
    let valid = true;
    Object.values(errors).forEach(
        (val) => val.length > 0 && (valid = false)
    );
    return valid;
}


class Main extends Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);

        this.state = {
            headerImage: '',
            artwork_content: '',
            artworks: [],
            artist_image: '',
            artist_content: '',
            email_content: '',

            phone_number: null,
            email: null,
            name: null,
            message: null,
            errors: {
                phone_number: '',
                name: '',
                email: '',
                message: '',
            }
        }
    }

    componentDidMount() {
        axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/home/').then(response => {
            let data = response.data.data
            this.setState({
                headerImage: data.header_image,
                artwork_content: data.artwork_content,
                artworks: data.artworks,
                artist_image: data.artist_image,
                artist_content: data.artist_content,
                email_content: data.email_content,
            })
        }).catch(error => {

        })

    }


    handleChange = (event) => {
        event.preventDefault();
        const {name, value} = event.target;
        let errors = this.state.errors;

        switch (name) {
            case 'name':
                errors.name =
                    value.length < 5
                        ? 'Name must be 5 characters long!'
                        : '';
                break;
            case 'email':
                errors.email =
                    validEmailRegex.test(value)
                        ? ''
                        : 'Email is not valid!';
                break;
            default:
                break;
        }

        this.setState({errors, [name]: value});
    }

    handleSubmit = (event) => {
        event.preventDefault();
        if (validateForm(this.state.errors)) {
            console.log(this.state.errors)
        } else {
            axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/util/contact', this.state).then(response => {
                console.log(response)
            })
                .catch(error => {
                    console.log(error)
                })
        }
    }

    render() {
        const {headerImage, artwork_content, artworks, artist_image, artist_content, email_content, errors} = this.state

        return (
            < div
        className = "wrapper home" >
            < section
        className = "main-banner" >
            < div
        className = "parallax-container" >
            < img
        src = {headerImage}
        className = "cover-bg"
        alt = "background" / >
            < /div>
            < h2
        className = "generic-title" > < img
        src = "logo.svg"
        className = "logo" / > < /h2>

            < nav
        className = "navigation top-menu" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container grid parallax-container page-section hero"
        id = "1" >
            < nav
        className = "navigation menu" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < div
        className = "heading" >
            {Parser(artwork_content)}
            < /div>
            < div
        className = "grid-inner" >
            {
                artworks.map(artwork => < div >
                    < img src = {artwork.image}  className = "img-fluid" / > < p > {artwork.name} < /p>
                < /div>)

            }
            < /div>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container page-section parallax-container  hero"
        id = "2" >
            < nav
        className = "navigation menu" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < /section>


            < section
        className = "middle-section parallax-container" >
            < div
        className = "row" >
            < div
        className = "col-lg-5 col-md-4" >
            < img
        src = {artist_image}
        className = "author-img"
        alt = "author" / >

            < p
        className = "photo-copyright" >© Photo
        by < a
        href = "#" > Michel
        Lunardelli < /a></
        p >
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "col-lg-7 col-md-8 description-right" >
            {Parser(artist_content)}
            < /div>
            < /div>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container page-section hero"
        id = "3" >
            < nav
        className = "navigation menu"
        id = "mainNav" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container parallax-container form-banner  hero" >
            < div
        className = "heading" >
            {Parser(email_content)}
            < /div>
            < div
        className = "form-banner-inner" >
            < form
        onSubmit = {this.handleSubmit}
        noValidate >
        < div
        className = "checkbox-panel " >
            < div
        className = "md-checkbox" >
            < input
        id = "check1"
        type = "checkbox"
        checked / >
        < label
        for= "check1" > Inquire about
        originalwork
        by
        Robert. < /label>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "md-checkbox" >
            < input
        id = "check2"
        type = "checkbox"
        checked / >
        < label
        for= "check2" > Inquire about
        Robert’s
        limited
        edition
        prints
        and
        sculpture. < /label>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "md-checkbox" >
            < input
        id = "check3"
        type = "checkbox"
        checked / >
        < label
        for= "check3" > To receive
        a
        very
        occasional
        newsletter
        from
        Robert’s
        studio
        please
        sign
        up
        here. < /label>
        < /div>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "form-panel" >
            < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < input
        type = "text"
        required = "required"
        name = 'email'
        onChange = {this.handleChange}
        noValidate / >
        < label
        className = "control-label" > Email < /label>
            < /div>
            < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < PhoneInput
        country = "us"
        required = "required"
        value = {this.phone_number}
        name = 'phone_number'
        noValidate / >
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < input
        type = "text"
        required = "required"
        name = 'name'
        onChange = {this.handleChange}
        noValidate / >
        < label
        className = "control-label" > Name < /label>

            < /div>
            < /div>

            < div
        className = "form-panel" >
            < div
        className = "form-group" >
            {
                errors.email.length > 0 && < div className = 'error' > {errors.email} < /div>}
                < /div>

                < div className = "form-group" >
                {
                    errors.phone_number.length > 0 && < div className = 'error' > {errors.phone_number} < /div>}
                    < /div>

                    < div className = "form-group" >
                    {
                        errors
                        .name.length > 0 && < div
                        className = 'error' > {errors.name} < /div>}
                        < /div>
                        < /div>

                        < div
                        className = "form-group" >
                        < textarea
                        required = "required"
                        name = 'message'
                        onChange = {this.handleChange}
                        noValidate > < /textarea>
                    < label className = "control-label" > Messages < /label>
                    < /div>

                    < div className = "form-group" >
                    {
                        errors.message.length > 0 && < div className = 'error' > {errors.message} < /div>}
                        < /div>

                        < button type = "submit" className = "send-btn button" > Send < /button>
                        < /form>
                        < /div>
                        < /section>
                        < /div>
    )
    }
}

export default Main
